author: admin
title: Bolanle Austen-Peters becomes first Nigerian woman to build a private theatre - NAIJ.COM
text: Bolanle Austen-Peters becomes first Nigerian woman to build a private theatre - NAIJ.COM NAIJ.COM The theatre, which also doubles as a movie-screening venue, will host a range of shows, plays and musicals when it opens. It will also have the challenging role of providing Lagos, its environs, and Nigeria as a whole with a wide schedule of theatre â€¦
